attributes.action: Ban the sales of noisy fireworks to the public in the uk, silent only.
attributes.additional_details:
Old age pensioners are terrified some have PTSD 
Pets are having to be sedated and wildlife is being killed on roads by running away in fear.
We want silent fireworks at displays too.
These fireworks have become a dread as they are happening throughout the year not just 5th November.
attributes.background:
Noisy fireworks have become a dread for so many people, also wild life, and family pets are suffering.
Youths are setting them off in bins and places close to houses making the bangs louder.
We dread this time of year in the uk.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
